identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Warmth over sterility. Functionality with a soul.

theme.inspiration: iFood internal app, Boutique Hostel aesthetics

primary.description: Warm Terracotta/Orange. Use for primary CTAs, price tags, and active states.

background.description: Cream/Bone White. Main app background to avoid clinical white sterility.

card.description: Pure White. Use for product cards to create lift against the cream background.

foreground.description: Dark Warm Grey. Softer than pure black for text.

secondary.description: Sage Green. Use for 'Success', 'Fresh', or secondary accents.

muted.description: Warm Grey. For borders, dividers, and secondary text.

headings.description: Rounded, friendly, welcoming. Use for Page Titles and Category Names.

body.description: Clean, legible, standard. Use for product descriptions, prices, and UI elements.

guest_storefront.navigation: Bottom Tab Bar (Home, Search, Cart, Info)
guest_storefront.grid_strategy: 2-column grid for categories. CRITICAL: Category names must be allowed 2 lines of height.
guest_storefront.spacing: Generous padding (p-4, p-6) to accommodate touch targets.

admin_dashboard.density: High density for data tables, but comfortable spacing for edit forms.

buttons.sizing: h-12 or h-14 for mobile touch targets

cards.border: No border or very subtle border-muted
cards.interaction: Lift on hover (translate-y-1) for desktop, ripple for mobile

whatsapp_checkout.style: Prominent Green (#25D366) or Primary Color button with WhatsApp Icon

visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl for cards, rounded-full for buttons
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Framer Motion for page transitions and cart additions

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #2D2A26 on #FDFBF7 or #FFFFFF. White text on #E05D44 is accessible.
accessibility.touch_targets: Minimum 44x44px for all interactive elements on mobile.
accessibility.text_scaling: Allow font scaling without breaking layout (use rem/em).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Nunito' font for headings by importing it from Google Fonts in index.css.
Configure tailwind.config.js with the custom color palette (Terracotta, Cream, etc.).
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the mobile-first container (max-w-md mx-auto for desktop view of guest app) vs full-width admin.
Ensure the Category Grid allows text to wrap to 2 lines. Do not use 'truncate'. Use 'line-clamp-2' if absolutely necessary, but prefer full display.
Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications (Added to cart, Order sent).
For the WhatsApp integration, format the message clearly: 'New Order - Room [X] - [Item List] - Total: [Value]'.
Admin Dashboard should be clean and functional. Use a data table component for the product list.
Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the initial category seeding.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects sparingly, prefer solid warm cards for this specific design.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
